channel.title: Adrià Cidre - Blog
channel.description: Writing about AI-assisted development, Claude Code workflows, and building software with AI.

item.title: /work-issue: Autonomous Implementation
item.description: The AI picks up a planned issue, implements it, tests it, commits, and marks it done. How headless batch mode lets me plan in the afternoon and wake up with code in the morning.

item.title: Your AI Forgot What You Said 30 Messages Ago
item.description: Context windows fill up fast in long AI conversations. Sliding windows, progressive compression, and token budgeting — the patterns I built before I knew their names.

item.title: /plan-issue: Collaborative Planning with AI
item.description: Vague instructions produce vague implementations. How I sit with the AI to refine rough ideas into concrete, implementable specs — before any code gets written.

item.title: AI-Assisted Development: A Loop, Not a Chat
item.description: The bottleneck isn't the AI — it's me. Three slash commands that form a loop: Plan, Work, QA. How structured phases replaced ad-hoc chatting and made AI development manageable.
